College_Name: SNJB's College of Engineering, Chandwad, Nashik
College_Summary: SNJB's College of Engineering is a private institute which is affiliated to SPPU, Pune and approved by AICTE. The college offers B.E. course in diverse disciplines at the undergraduate level and offers MBA courses at the postgraduate level. Admission to the B.E. course will be done based on the candidate's performance in JEE Main/ MHT CET whereas for admission to the MBA course a valid score in CAT/ MAT/ XAT/MAH-MBA CET is taken into consideration. The highest placement package offered to SNJB's students is around INR 8.50 LPA

The college also aimed at providing quality education filled with allegiance and devotion to the sons and daughters of the nation. The students of the college are bestowed with an affable environment which is filled with contemporary education and a sense of motivation towards a holistic development to render the aspirations of the students of being socially active, educated and to satisfy the needs of their dear ones. The mentors of the college play an important role in the development of the college and also coordinates with the students in every challenging situation.
